subject: Attention: Sir/Madam
body:
Attention: Sir/Madam
On behalf of the Department Of Treasury Direct-Account Washington DC,
and United Nations Cash Grant Award Payment, we wish to notify you as
a beneficiary of $20.5 million dollars in compensation of scam
victims. You are the next person to be paid for the (Scam victims). Am
here to inform you that we have verified your inheritance file
presently on my desk, and I found out that you have not received your
payment due to your lack of co-operation and not fulfilling the
obligations giving to you in respect to your inheritance payment.
Secondly, you are hereby advised to stop dealing with some
non-officials in the bank or any offices as this is an illegal act and
you have to stop if you so wish to receive your payment immediately.
After the board meeting held at our headquarters, we have resolved in
finding a solution to your problem, and we would like to inform you
that we have arranged your fund $20.5 million through our Online bank
to bank transfer or ATM Master Card, which is the instruction given by
Department Of Treasury Direct-Account Washington DC and United Nations
Cash Grant Award Payment to you. You are required to get back to us
through this email: 
richarddouglas20200@gmail.com
Below is the information needed from you urgently?
[1] Full Names: ___________
[2] Contact address: ___________
[3] Direct Telephone No: ________________
[4] Occupation: __________
[5] Age: _______________
[6] Sex: _______________
[7] Country: _______________
[8] Your ID or valid passport copy: ___________________
I wait for your urgent response for the claim of your fund.
Thanks for your maximum co-operation.
Richard Douglas
Department Of Treasury Direct-Account
United Nations Fund's Remittance

subject: Re:    Attention: Sir/Madam
body:
Hello Richard Douglas,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised and excited about this news! It's not every day that one hears they are due to receive a large sum of money.

I'm curious, how was I selected for this? And could you please explain more about the United Nations Cash Grant Award Payment? I've never heard of it before.

Also, you mentioned something about an Online bank transfer or ATM Master Card. Could you provide more details on these options?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Ellen

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam
body:
DEPARTMENT OF THE TREASURY
         1500 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW Washington, D.C. 20220 U.S.A

Dear:

We acknowledge the receipt of your email and in regards to that, we
want to specifically inform you that United State Government including
European Parliament and Asian Governments have given Department of the
Treasury Washington DC instruction to release your US$20.5M as a
compensation which i was nominated to handle all the outstanding
payment which your name was short-listed as one of the beneficiaries
that are entitled to receive the above $20,500,000.00
outstanding payment without any further delay.

Meanwhile all legal documents from the Department of the Treasury
Direct-Account Washington DC will be released to you before your
US$20.5M will be credited into your bank account.

As part of the required process, kindly provide your full details
listed below for proper verification.

1.    Your Full Name…
2.    Your Home Address…
3.    Your Mobile Telephone Number…
4.    Your Occupation…
5.    Your Bank Name…
6.    Your Bank Account Name…
7.    Your Bank Address…
8.    Your Bank Account Number…
9.    Your Bank Swift Code…

We have three payment options for you to choose one for it. Therefore
you must select any of the payment options below so that we can
finalize for the immediate release of your fund.

(a) Inter switch ATM Card
(b) Bank to bank wire transfer
(c) Certified Bank Draft

I will be waiting to hear from you so that I can start processing your
transaction immediately.

Yours Faithfully

Richard Douglas
Department of the Treasury Direct-Account
Director of Accountant and United Nation

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam
body:
Hello Richard Douglas,

Thank you for your email. It's quite exciting to hear about this opportunity. I must say, it's not every day that one receives such news.

I'm curious about the payment options you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about each of them? For instance, how does the Inter switch ATM Card work? And what would be the process for a bank to bank wire transfer or receiving a Certified Bank Draft?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ellen

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam
body:
DEPARTMENT OF THE TREASURY
         1500 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW Washington, D.C. 20220 U.S.A

Dear:

I got your email and the content well noted. however before we start the
processing of your payment of us$20.5m you have to choose one of these
payment options below to enable us proceed further,

please note that any choice you choose that you must pay the fee before
this transaction will be carried out  please choose any one that you know
you can afford the money  please knows of any choices you make will be paid
before any transaction will be carried out that is the instruction from
united nations in line wait the world  bank for a successful transaction
with us the bank of america united states.

1) telegraphic wire transfer....$1,550 to secure the FUND PERMIT SEAL OF
TRANSFER (FPST) that will enable us to commence with your transaction as
programmed here in our system.

2) ATM card....$950 for the processing and the delivering of the atm card
which will enable you access and withdraw the funds in any atm machine
anywhere in the world with a maximum withdrawal of 10,000 dollars daily.

3) certified bank draft...$975 for issue and delivering process

choose one and get back to us as soon as possible to enable us start the
processing of your payment.

1.    Your Full Name…
2.    Your Home Address…
3.    Your Mobile Telephone Number…
4.    Your Occupation…
5.    Your Bank Name…
6.    Your Bank Account Name…
7.    Your Bank Address…
8.    Your Bank Account Number…
9.    Your Bank Swift Code…

We have three payment options for you to choose one for it. Therefore
you must select any of the payment options below so that we can
finalize for the immediate release of your fund.

(a) Inter switch ATM Card
(b) Bank to bank wire transfer
(c) Certified Bank Draft

I will be waiting to hear from you so that I can start processing your
transaction immediately.

Yours Faithfully

Richard Douglas
Department of the Treasury Direct-Account
Director of Accountant and United Nation

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam
body:
Hello Richard Douglas,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information. I appreciate the options you've provided for the payment process. However, before I proceed further, I have a few questions that I hope you could help me with.

1. Could you please explain more about the FUND PERMIT SEAL OF TRANSFER (FPST)? How does it work and why is it necessary?
2. Regarding the ATM card option, what are the charges associated with processing and delivering? Also, is there any limit on how much I can withdraw daily?
3. For the certified bank draft, how long would it take to issue and deliver?

I'm sorry for all these questions but as they say, better safe than sorry! Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ellen
